The dissenting member ' s opinion is outlined as follows: (1) the scope of discussion in the CBSS does not fit the objectives of the Committee, for while the CBSS mainly discusses over-the-counter derivatives in the dealer to dealer market, the Committee deals with products such as bonds and loans that need to reflect the opinions of various interest rate benchmark users; and (2) discussion on currency swaps which are derivatives shall primarily be conducted by a relevant body under the International Swaps and Derivatives Association (ISDA) such as the Benchmark Working Group, for the fruit of the discussion would ultimately be reflected in the ISDA ' s documents including its Definitions.
